products.name: Premium Wireless Headphones
products.description: Experience crystal-clear audio with our premium wireless headphones. Features active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design.

products.name: Smart Watch Pro
products.description: Stay connected with our feature-packed smartwatch. Heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, water resistance, and 7-day battery life.

products.name: Vintage Leather Backpack
products.description: Handcrafted genuine leather backpack with multiple compartments. Perfect for work or travel with laptop sleeve included.

products.name: Ultra Boost Running Shoes
products.description: Engineered for performance with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Ideal for long-distance running.

products.name: RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: Tactile mechanical switches with per-key RGB lighting. Programmable macros and aircraft-grade aluminum frame.

products.name: Coffee Maker Deluxe
products.description: Brew barista-quality coffee at home. Features built-in grinder, milk frother, and programmable settings.
